name: Retrospective - Performance issues with Graphql cache purging

updates.content:
Our CDN provider noted a performance issue with cache purging between Aug 24, 2020 - 23:10 UTC and Aug 25, 2020 - 02:44 UTC.

This may have caused a slowdown in purging the Graphql query cache.

https://status.fastly.com/incidents/hyj3fw6vyggm
